_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The four benefits of following the teach: Memory of the teachings comes back to the being when they are reborn in one of the orders of gods, and they quickly reach distinction.
A mendicant with psychic powers teaches Dhamma to the assembly of gods, and the being remembers their past life and quickly reaches distinction.
A god teaches Dhamma to the assembly of gods, and the being remembers their past life and quickly reaches distinction.
A being who has been reborn spontaneously reminds another such being of their past life, and they quickly reach distinction.
